Package clock

Class View

java.lang.Object
clock.View
public class View extends Object
The View part of the MVC architecture. Performs all actions to do with the user interface.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors

    Description
    View()
    Create a new View.

  • Constructor Details

    • View

      public View()
      Create a new View.

  • Method Details

    • initializeCallbacks

      public void initializeCallbacks(Controller controller)
      Initializes all the controls in the view to send their events to the provided controller.
      Parameters:
      controller - The controller to send events to.

    • toggleAlarmEditorVisibility

      public void toggleAlarmEditorVisibility()
      Toggles the visibility of the alarm editor. Expands the size of the window if it is below the minimum size when showing the alarm editor.

    • showAlarmDialog

      public Alarm showAlarmDialog()
      Shows a dialog asking the user to specify the parameters for a new alarm. Returns null if the user clicks cancel.
      Returns:
      The Alarm that the user specified or null.

    • showAlarmDialog

      public Alarm showAlarmDialog(Alarm alarmToEdit)
      Shows a dialog asking the user to edit the alarm provided to this method. Returns null if the user clicks cancel.
      Parameters:
      alarmToEdit - The alarm that will be presented to the user to edit.
      Returns:
      The Alarm the user edited or null.

    • showYesNoDialog

      public boolean showYesNoDialog(String message)
      Shows a dialog displaying the message provided with a yes and no option.
      Parameters:
      message - The message to display to the user.
      Returns:
      True if Yes option was selected.

    • showSaveFileDialog

      public File showSaveFileDialog()
      Shows a dialog asking the user to select a file path to save to.
      Returns:
      The File object referencing the path selected by the user or null.

    • showOpenFileDialog

      public File showOpenFileDialog()
      Shows a dialog asking the user to select a file path to open from.
      Returns:
      The File object referencing the path selected by the user or null.

    • displayPopupBox

      public void displayPopupBox(String message)
      Shows the user a popup box displaying the message provided.
      Parameters:
      message - The message to show to the user.

    • getAlarmEditorSelectionIndex

      public int getAlarmEditorSelectionIndex()
      Get the index of the item selected by the user in the alarm editor list.
      Returns:
      The index of the item selected by the user in the alarm editor list.

    • toggleDigitalAnalogue

      public void toggleDigitalAnalogue()
      Unimplemented.

    • updateAlarmEditor

      public void updateAlarmEditor(PriorityQueue queue)
      Clears the alarm editor list and repopulates it from the provided queue.
      Parameters:
      queue - The queue to populate the alarm editor list with.

    • updateAlarmHand

      public void updateAlarmHand(int alarmHour, int alarmMinute)
      Updates the position of the alarm hand on the clock panel.
      Parameters:
      alarmHour - The hour the alarm hand should indicate.
      alarmMinute - The minute the alarm hand should indicate.

    • updateTime

      public void updateTime(int hour, int minute, int second)
      Updates the time displayed by the clock panel.
      Parameters:
      hour - The hour the clock should indicate.
      minute - The minute the clock should indicate.
      second - The second the clock should indicate.
